divs: sighting details the first sighting occured a few minutes before a 3rd of july fireworks show. i saw a light hovering over\behind a building that was perhaps a mile or more away. i thought it was a star or planet, as it was nearly nighttime. then, it began to move to the right, slowly at first, but gaining speed until it passed to my right at a distance of at least a mile, and an elevation of over a mile. at first, it looked almost exactly like a star. as it got closer, i could clearly see a disc shape with exterior lights. it passed behind trees and faded. my family discarded it as a helicopter, but they had never looked at it. the second sighting was during the fireworks, at night. i saw a stationary object hovering far behind where the fireworks were being launched. then, it too, picked up speed and faded in the distance. this one had three yellow lights on the edges and a red one in the center, none of which blinked. neither one made any noise, though the place was very crowded, so i can't be sure. i know that other people saw this, but most (or all) thought it was a helicopter\airplane. i am not so sure, as i live relatively close to an airport.
Summary: 3rd of July double sighting during/before fireworks.
